summary: Software Engineering Analyst with experience in QA automation, functional testing, and project leadership. Proficient in Python, SQL, C, R, and Tableau; experienced with HP QTP/HP ALM, VBScript, and automation tooling. Has contributed to social impact projects and worked with cross-functional teams; strong analytical, communication, and project management skills.

experience.title: Software Engineering Analyst
experience.description: Founded project Soul of the clay as the team lead to upskill artisans, increasing their income; executed projects Naritva for women sanitation and Jaivika to bolster farmers with low-cost manure production; led Student Alumni Interaction Cell and managed events.

experience.title: Software Engineering Analyst
experience.description: Delivered automation tools using HP Quick Test Professional and VB Script to achieve 95% test coverage and increase process efficiency by 25%.

experience.title: Associate Software Engineer
experience.description: Worked as part of the QA team for a leading Oil and Gas company; performed functional testing in a simulation lab; drafted test scenarios in collaboration with business analysts; ensured smooth functioning of 300 sites globally.

certifications: Coursera - Introduction to Interactive Programming Using Python, Rice University
